sections.heading: council action; rights of adjoining property owner
sections.text: In cases of appeal from an action of the city council condemning real property as a nuisance or as dangerous under the police powers of the city, the owners of adjoining property may intervene in the action at any time before trial.SourceLaws 1985,

19-710.City council action; rights of adjoining property owner.

In cases of appeal from an action of the city council condemning real property as a nuisance or as dangerous under the police powers of the city, the owners of adjoining property may intervene in the action at any time before trial.

SourceLaws 1985, LB 532, ยง 1;Laws 2019, LB193, ยง 66.
